betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oTinker's tools and armor do no accept enchantments.

Instead, they can be upgraded in the tool/armor forge! Place the tool in the middle, and the modifiers around!

Each tool has a maximum amout of modifiers, but it unlocks more modifiers the more you use it!

§7§oThe following items can be used to upgrade tinker's tools and armor!
